roleset.name: Natural Disaster: severe blowing snow storm
roleset.note: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: I'm going to be honest and say that it is hard to get motivated to go out to the gym when my area just went through a snow blizzard with 15-17 inches worth of snow.

example.name: arg5 (with some extra info included in the node)
example.text: Hundreds of vehicles were stranded in ditches Thursday, Dec. 20, as commuters attempted to travel in a blizzard with wind gusts higher than 50 mph and blowing snow that reduced visibility at times to a car length.
example.arg: with wind gusts higher than 50mph and blowing snow that reduced visibility at times to a car length
